intervention_catalogue.name: New Me MOT
intervention_catalogue.short_description: This toolkit is designed to help probation practitioners support graduates of Accredited Programmes.
long_description: This toolkit is designed to help probation practitioners support graduates of Accredited Programmes. It includes short exercises to help the person on probation generalise their learning to new circumstances and contexts as they progress through the sentence

enabling_intervention.qualifying_previous_intervention:
This is for graduates of the following Accredited Programmes: 
* Kaizen
* Becoming New Me
* Horizon
* iHorizon
* New Me Strengths
* Living as New me
* Healthy Sex Programme
* Cognitive Self Change Programme (CSCP)
* Self Change Programme (SCP)
enabling_intervention.convicted_for_offence_type:
This is for men convicted of any of the following offence types: 
* acquisitive or financial
* alcohol or drugs motivated 
* domestic abuse 
* motoring
* robbery
* sexual
* violence (non-domestic violence)

In the community (for men sentenced to a Community Order) New Me MOT is currently only available for delivery with men with sexually-motivated convictions.
